grid.title: Resources by Weekday
grid.sqlSelect: select ConfigScheduleDayId, WeekDayNbr, WeekDayName, ResourceCount, RoleId, RoleName, IsActive, LocationLookupID, LocationName, @ORGANIZATION_ID as Organization_Id from [dbo].[GetConfigScheduleDays] ( @ORGANIZATION_ID)
grid.sqlDelete: declare @UserId bigint = (SELECT USERID FROM DBO.AspNetUsers WHERE USERNAME = @__LoginId__) exec dbo.ConfigScheduleDay_Delete @ConfigScheduleDayId = @CONFIGSCHEDULEDAYID, @UserId = @UserId

column.label: Week Day
column.dataSelect: select cast(1 as int) as WeekDayNbr, 'Sunday' as WeekDayName union all select 2 as WeekDayNbr, 'Monday' union all select 3 as WeekDayNbr, 'Tuesday' union all select 4 as WeekDayNbr, 'Wednesday' union all select 5 as WeekDayNbr, 'Thursday' union all select 6 as WeekDayNbr, 'Friday' union all select 7 as WeekDayNbr, 'Saturday'

column.label: Role
column.dataSelect: select Role_Id as RoleId, Name as RoleName from dbo.Roles with(nolock) where Organization_Id = @ORGANIZATION_ID and UsedByScheduler = 1 order by RoleName OFFSET 0 ROWS

column.label: Location
column.dataSelect: select lookup_id as LocationLookupID, lookup_name as LocationName from dbo.Lookups_Active_V with(nolock) where type_code = 'location' and Attribute1 = isnull(convert(varchar(10), @ORGANIZATION_ID), Attribute1)
